summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5807 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Jefferson Heights Division No. 1, being the alley between Angeline Street and Alaska Street, from Beacon Avenue to Angeline Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76565 as amended by Ordinance No. 76841, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
